channel.title: [317] Impunity Allstar [317]
channel.description:
Welcome, i am hosting this server because FS, as you see, Is offline. I dont want allstars to go extinct so i will always update and keep this server in check & do the best i can. I know server still has dupes andbugs. But tell me i will fix we are still in beta stage.
~ 2 bosses ~ Dung ~ Spined Armor (Max Set) ~ Zombie Minigame ~ Dicing ~ Custom Titles ~ lamps ~ Mystery Box's ~ Viewinfo (To see stats of player) ~ Nice Friendly Staff ~ Rares ~ Spined armor with custom effect -Lamps were added -Red heart crystal: makes you 5 seconds invinsible, depends where in server -Grey heart crystal: Repleshes your health -Crystal shield splits damage -A complete party room with fully working balloons and chests -All glitches dupes are fixed - including cheat clients -Full anti nuller -2 bosses are added - Bash & Daggnoth boss -Dicing zone - fully working dice area * Can only dice in the dice area -Barrows is now updated - Fully working and operational barrows * Have to kill all barrows brothers to access tunnel and get your prize -Rares area - 1-5% drop on items there -Lamp is added -Achievements have been added -Titles are in the process of the making -Server is stable - we make it stable everyday -Prayer glitch is fixed -Telegrab glitch is fixed -ALL connections from a cheat client are blocked -Range projectiles added -Maxhit command is more accuret -Player base is steady -Skills updated *Cut down trees for logs to firemake & fletch *Agility course is added -Bosses have full animations and special attacks -Server uptime is in quest tab. (: (No use for it just for fun lol.) ****NOTE***
Pictures. [URL=http://s1099.photobucket.com/user/marbic1/media/StrPker3_zpsa4805db5.png.html][IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/StrPker3_zpsa4805db5.png[/img][/URL]
Zombie Minigame per kill you get a few tickets, and zombie boss you get 5.. and trade it in for armor and wepeons. [URL=http://s1099.photobucket.com/user/marbic1/media/StrPker1_zps9e48d886.png.html][IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/StrPker1_zps9e48d886.png[/img][/URL]
Prime Boss [URL=http://s1099.photobucket.com/user/marbic1/media/StrPker_zpsc0a684e0.png.html][IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/StrPker_zpsc0a684e0.png[/img][/URL] This is a server still in devolopment. We have been modifying the server to the best of our ability/ matthew and me (str pker)
Forums link: [url=http://StrPkerscape.webs.com]StrPkerscape.webs.com[/url]
Barrows - Barrows now keeps track of kills. once you have 5 killed you can go get your prize! Chest is used to get spade [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0015_zps73ed97c4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/picture3_zps6bb80bbb.png[/img]
Dicing is fixed ^^^ can only dice in the area.
Fire making and more skills are being updated [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0012_zpsc131bc20.png[/img]
Skilling area! [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/LAlal_zpsfff1afde.png[/img]
The party room! [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0022_zps7d9ca3e4.png[/img]
Balloons falling!~ Pop the ballons to find the items put in the chest and pull the lever and BOOM [IMG]http://i1099.photobucket.com/albums/g382/marbic1/evolved0026_zpsccba0aa4.png[/img]
More photos will be added
More to Come along with pictures. But JOIN NOW!
Client link : http://up.ht/12ThDFl

item.title: [317] Impunity Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @RankTex RankTex
item.description:
@RankTex wrote:

I would like to say that I really like this source. I have played it for a few days, and became a trusted dicer. Yesterday I went to the shops to buy an item, and clicked talk, instead of trade, on an npc. And the NPC said “Welcome to MYOLDSERVERNAME” and I was like… wait what?? So I clicked on Hans because he should have said the same thing if it was my old source… Hans said the exact same thing. I was informed that Str Pker had ripped my old server’s dungeoneering out of my source, without giving me ANY credit. I logged into the world and asked him about it, bla bla bla, and he finally gave me credits for the dungeoneering. Ok so yesterday I asked him why he leached my server. He said that he didn’t. I showed him my proof that he DID leach my server. He says someone named Kelly gave him the source. Then while talking to him on his server, he said he just searched my server and saw it on the download threads page. I have kindly asked him 2 times if he was going to stop using my source (since he did not give me ANY credits for it, only the dung) and he said he was going to continue using it, since he didn’t have time to transfer his things to a different server.

Now I am going to expose things about this server.

==

~ Dung - CODED 100% BY ME WITH SOME HELP OF REAPERXSCAPE
~ Custom Titles - CODED 100% BY ME
~ lamps - CODED 100% BY ME
~ Mystery Box’s - CODED 100% BY ME
-Lamps were added - …yeah by me…
-A complete party room with fully working balloons and chests - DOES NOT WORK: PARTY ROOM IS HIS SHOPS
-All glitches dupes are fixed - including cheat clients - I LOG IN WITH A CHEAT CLIENT EVERY TIME I PLAY AND I CAN DO 12 DUPES
-Full anti nuller - DOESNT HAVE ANTI NULL
-Achievements have been added - NO THEY HAVE NOT
-Prayer glitch is fixed - NO IT IS NOT
-Telegrab glitch is fixed - NO IT IS NOT
-ALL connections from a cheat client are blocked - NO THEY ARE NOT, I LOG IN EVERY TIME WITH ONE
-Player base is steady - YESTERDAY THERE WAS 8 PLAYERS ONLINE. NOW? THERE WAS 1, ME - THERE ARE NOW NONE.

===========

I HAVE PROOF OF HIM ADMITTING HE LEACHED MY SERVER - I WILL UPLOAD THEM HERE SOON.

Sorry Str Pker. I told you that if I do not receive credit for the things I’ve done, I would do this. Maybe next time you download a source… be sure to give proper credits.

CREDITS SHOULD GO TO ME AND ReaperXScape AND MOD ALLSTAR!

EDIT: HIS LOTTERY DOES NOT EVEN WORK. IT TOOK 150M FROM ME WHEN I WON AND I RECEIVED NOTHING.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Impunity Allstar [317]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Str Pker CODER:

It’s my brothers. So technically. I’m not going against the rules

Actually, it is because you would be getting your friends to constantly bump the thread for you.

If you are found to be constantly starting arguments, [b]continuously getting others to bump your topic[/b], or getting friends to post more advertisements, all related topics/advertisements will be locked and you will not be permitted to create a new one.
I thought that deleting the posts by that account on this thread would be enough. If it happens again I'm locking this thread. Good luck with your server.

EDIT: The second account rule is more relaxed than before, 3lv3n. For the most part, it is only in cases like this where you are penalized for using secondary accounts.
